that investors and founders like you are coming over to see what all the fuss is about — the sprawling startup hubs, the lush urban life, the inventions taking the world by storm, and the world’s biggest startup event, Slush.

This is your chance to find out if Helsinki, the self-proclaimed Silicon Valley of the North, is worth the hype.
